name: songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jet_set_radio_api.
Tool description: A data provider for all things Jet Set Radio in JSON format!
API description: Fetches a list of songs from JSR/JSRF using the specified parameters.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return in the response. Default is '5'.

sortby.description: The field by which to sort the results. Possible values include fields on the document, e.g., 'name', 'stats'. Default is 'name'.

orderby.description: The order in which to sort the results. Possible values are 'asc' for ascending and 'desc' for descending. The `sortby` parameter must be present for this to take effect. Default is 'asc'.
